text: Giulio Spisanelli (died 1658) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period, active mainly in Bologna. Spisanelli was born at Bologna. His brother was the painter Ippolito Bolognese. He first trained under the painter Vincenzo Spisanelli, his father, then under Domenico Maria Canuti. He traveled to Rome at the instigation of his father, but died soon after returning to Bologna.Abecedario pittorico dei professori piu illustri in pittura, scultura, e architettura. by Pellegrino Antonio Orlandi, page 759. ==References== Category:Year of birth unknown Category:1662 deaths Category:People from Bologna Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Bolognese painters Category:Italian Baroque painters
title: Giulio Spisanelli
